content.rendered:
iBuy is a comprehensive mobile resource to kick off your next E-commerce app design project with ease. Design at a high velocity with this super crisp UI Kit that was built with care. We use the 8px design grid to ensure precise execution at every turn. Most importantly, it’s super easy to customize to fit your style with nested symbols and components.

Features

  • 80+ iOS High-Quality Templates
  • Well Organized Layers
  • Compatible with Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD
  • Nested Symbols
  • SF Pro Display Font
  • Fully Customizable

With this UI Kit, we’ve thought of everything so you don’t have to.

And, with over 80+ screens, we’ve got all the screens you’ll need including Splash, Onboarding, Login, Signup, Category, Cart, Payment screen and many more.

Need any help?? Send an email to: design@brightscout.com
